name: Poopie Bird
description:
Look son, or daughter. you have the dream - no - a DESTINY to go ahead and poop on as many people as you can. It's in our blood, you hear me? Embrace your birthright and fly high - no, HIGHER - and drop poop at hundreds of miles per hour on people's heads.

Think you can do it? No, I KNOW you can. Embrace your destiny.

Poopie Bird!

--

How to Play
- Tap left side of the screen to Fly, Right side to Poop.
- Your poo is precious; don't waste a drop!
- You must hit every one on they head.
- Beat your high score!
